name: a bit all over the place

content.html: It's interesting and actually quite heart-warming to see how the Stardust film grows in popularity each year, as people who would love it find it. I don't mind that it never got a sequel. We got Stardust. wegotthiscovered.com/movies/fantasy…
content.value:
It's interesting and actually quite heart-warming to see how the Stardust film grows in popularity each year, as people who would love it find it. I don't mind that it never got a sequel. We got Stardust.
